text:
In Europe, “rewilding” is aiding the reintroduction of key animal species, including bison. Visitors to the forests and meadows of western Romania are helping to track the new species.
https://t.co/BC5x5dekIr https://t.co/zTyjoQyGWJ
@Rafaels98891360 Does that mean Romania's withdrawal is permanent? What if TVR decided to leave the EBU altogether?

Travel article on a European safari to rewilding project in Romania

"On Safari in the Transylvanian Alps, Where Bison Roam Once More"
https://t.co/GzY7sqZcfh

Any major shipment of Western armaments to Moldova, which is situated between Romania and Ukraine and is not a member of NATO, is almost certain to inflame the Kremlin.

https://t.co/F0Zlt6xTcw
Not meaningless even it's either playing on the outskirts of a refugee camp in Belarus with no stadium lights or near the train tracks in Romania https://t.co/GMT87zl8qr

Interesting that the @GOP voted against this.

They also voted against the #DomesticTerrorismPreventionAct.

They also voted against the bill addressing #GasPrice gouging.

They also voted against the #ViolenceAgainstWomen bill.

They also voted against the #Ukraine aid.
